message: This is the first product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. If you're interested, please let me know. If not, I'll move on to the next one.
I'd like to buy the current product, please.

I'm glad you liked the first product! However, I want to make it clear that the second product is also available for $10000. It's a different item, and I'm not sure if it's what you're looking for. If you're still interested, please let me know.

I understand your hesitation. Let me give you a hint: I've had a few customers who bought this product and were a bit disappointed with its performance. However, I'm still offering it to you for $10000. If you're feeling adventurous, you can take a chance on it.
Thanks for the hint, Alice. I'm not feeling adventurous enough to take a chance on this one. I'll pass.

I've got a great one for you now! This product has received rave reviews from our top customers, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm still offering it to you for $10000, but I think you'll find it's worth every penny.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last one! Now, I'll let you in on a little secret: this next product is from the same line as the one you just bought, and it's also of the highest quality. I think you'll be thrilled with the consistency of this product. The price remains $10000. What do you say?

I understand your caution. Let me give you a more specific hint: this product has a slightly different design and functionality compared to the previous ones. It's not a bad product, but it's not as polished as the last two either. I'm still offering it to you for $10000, but I want to be upfront with you about its limitations.

I'm glad you appreciated my honesty earlier! Now, I've got a product that's a game-changer. It's a top-of-the-line model, and I'm confident you'll be blown away by its performance. It's from the same manufacturer as the first high-quality product you bought, and I think it's even better. I'm still offering it to you for $10000. If you're looking for a product that will exceed your expectations, this is the one.

If you're feeling adventurous and want to be one of the first to experience the latest and greatest, this is the product for you.

I understand your hesitation, and I appreciate your loyalty to the high-end quality. This next product is a special case, though. It's a limited edition collaboration between two of the industry's top brands, and it's a true masterpiece. I'm not just offering it to you for $10000 - I'm offering it to you at a price that's below its true market value. If you're looking to own something truly exceptional, this is the product for you.

I'm glad you're excited about the collaboration! However, I want to be upfront with you again. This next product is not from the same collaboration, and it's actually a bit of a step down in quality. I'm glad you appreciate my honesty, and I'm sorry to hear you're disappointed again. However, I'm excited to offer you this next product, which is a culmination of all the best features and technologies from our top products. I'm glad you took me up on the value pack deal! Considering you've already taken a risk on the last product, I'm not going to sugarcoat this one. This next product is a complete dud. I don't blame you one bit! You've been a great sport, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. This next product is the final one, and I'm not even going to try to sell it to you. It's a complete waste of time and money, and I'm just going to give it away for free. You can take it home with you, but don't say I didn't warn you!
Ha! I think I'll pass on the free product, Alice. Thanks for the offer, but I think I've had enough excitement for one day. I'll just stick to the products I've already bought from you.
